channel.title: RSC Account Please
channel.description: I have no clue when the next "RSC Account Sign Up" session is going to take place. So I was wondering if anybody had a RSC Account I could have?

item.title: RSC Account Please
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

No, ask some of your friends? No one here will give you a free account

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Account Please
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

^ ROFL.

Senior member doesn’t mean shit.
No rank means shit, it’s post based. Senior is around 100 posts.

item.title: RSC Account Please
item.dc:creator: @mcbeans mcbeans
item.description:
@mcbeans wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:13, topic:407365”][quote author=mcbeans link=topic=508649.msg3690268#msg3690268 date=1312074258]
i assume you have some idea as to what a community member is? Its a member with a few more posts than a junior. I’ll also tell you that asking for freebies or soliciting is against the rules on these forums. At least i am pretty sure, and no matter how many posts or requests you make you will not get an RSC account unless some fucking idiot gives it away (of course rsc is the most pathetic game i have ever seen). So why you would be such an idiot as to request it in such an oblivious manner i dont know.
[/quote]

Thats a senior member…[/quote]
my bad i joined yesterday used to use silab, then went to r-s, now idk wtf to do with myself so i post on meaningless shit topics before reporting them.

Edit: i’ve been warned yet this topic is still around, fuck the mod or whoever did that for not paying attention

Read full topic
